SPIDRV_HandleData_t Struct Reference
[SPIDRV]

SPI driver instance handle data structure. More...

#include <spidrv.h>

Detailed Description

SPI driver instance handle data structure.

The handle is allocated by the application using SPIDRV. There may be several concurrent driver instances in an application. The application is not supposed to neither write nor read the contents of the handle.
